creator: quasar7@gmail.com
text:
Is it possible to sort the items in the context menu, when adding a logic
controller (Add -> Logic Controller) ?
This activity can be extended to the other context menus as well.

Thank you!

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
They ae "sorted" - but just not using the ordering you want/expect...

What sort order are you requesting?
Alphabetical by simple classname? full classname?
Order in component reference?
User-defined order?

Alphabetical order by display name might not be what you want...

I was thinking an alphabetical order, so it'd be easier to locate the "simple
controller" at a glance.
What do you think? Could it be useful? and what do you mean with "Alphabetical
order by display name might not be what you want"?

Thank you :)
creator: quasar7@gmail.com

text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> What do you think? Could it be useful? 

Yes, if the new ordering makes sense to more people.

> and what do you mean with "Alphabetical
> order by display name might not be what you want"?

For example there are two SOAP samplers, but they have rather different names.

And the Controllers come in different categories - is the name really the most 
important feature?

Also, what about other languages?
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
One solution should be to sort the translation used as menu item, this could be
extended for the other context menus.
creator: quasar7@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #4)
> One solution should be to sort the translation used as menu item, this could 
be
> extended for the other context menus.

Indeed, but the resulting order might not make sense - for the same reason 
that the English names don't necessarily sort sensibly.

text:
Ok, I see... So I can live with it anyway.. Was just a suggestion, but not vital.

Thanks anyway :)
